hero.subtitle: Manage your finances with powerful tools, instant transactions, and top-tier security.

youthOffer.title: Between 18 and 25?
youthOffer.line2: Your account, your rules, no commitment.
youthOffer.line3: AmCbunq. The bank that believes in your potential.

featuresSection.title: A banking experience designed for you

feature1.title: Manage your budget, effortlessly
feature1.description: With the AmCbunq app, simplify your daily budget management. Open an account, get a card, track your expenses, and manage your budget in a single application!

feature2.title: Cards that adapt to you
feature2.description: Physical or virtual, choose the card that suits you. Enjoy secure payments and customizable limits to control your spending.

feature3.title: AI at your service
feature3.description: Our AI assistant analyzes your expenses to provide you with personalized advice and help you identify savings opportunities. Take control of your finances.

pricingSection.title: Clear offers for all your needs

account.title: AmCbunq Account & Card
account.description: The everyday account to track your expenses and simplify your budget management.
features: Cash deposits and withdrawals at points of sale

bills.title: AmCbunq Bills
bills.description: Control your budget, decide when and how to pay your expenses with our services.
features: Payment of your bills by card

testimonial1.quote: AmCbunq has transformed the way I manage my finances. It's simple, intuitive, and incredibly powerful. I couldn't live without it!
testimonial1.name: Sophie Dubois

testimonial2.quote: Security is my number one priority, and AmCbunq takes it very seriously. I feel completely confident managing all my transactions.
testimonial2.name: Marc Lemaître

testimonial3.quote: The AI assistant is revolutionary. It helped me find savings I would have never seen on my own. I recommend it 100%.
testimonial3.name: Bernard ROUX

partnersSection.title: Our Partners
partnersSection.description: AmCbunq is licensed and regulated by the Prudential Control and Resolution Authority (ACPR). Your funds are protected and secured in accordance with the strictest regulatory standards. The security of your transactions and personal data is our absolute priority.

notifications.verificationDescription: Please complete your identity verification. To comply with financial regulations and ensure the security of your account, this is a necessary step to access features like transfers and card services.

appearance.title: Appearance

help.title: Help & Support
help.faqDescription: Find answers to frequently asked questions.
help.contactDescription: Can't find what you're looking for? Contact our support team.

faq.question: How do I open an account?
faq.answer: You can open an account right from our homepage by clicking 'Open an Account'. The process is fast and takes only a few minutes.

faq.question: What documents do I need for verification?
faq.answer: For verification, you will need a valid government-issued photo ID (Passport or ID Card), a proof of address (like a utility bill), and you'll need to take a selfie for biometric verification.

faq.question: How secure is my money?
faq.answer: Your security is our top priority. We use state-of-the-art encryption, two-factor authentication, and adhere to strict regulatory standards to protect your money and data.

faq.question: Are there any fees?
faq.answer: We believe in transparent pricing. You can find our fee structure on our pricing page. Many standard services like account maintenance are free.

contactForm.successDescription: Thanks for contacting us. We'll get back to you as soon as possible.
contactForm.errorDescription: Failed to send message. Please try again later.

contactCta.title: Need more help?
contactCta.description: Can't find the answer to your question? Log in to your account to contact our support team via secure messaging.

chat.title: Chat
chat.headerDescription: Ask your financial advisor any questions you have.
chat.welcomeMessage: This is the beginning of your conversation.
chat.welcomeMessageSubtext: You can ask questions about your account, transactions, or any other topic.
chat.connectionErrorText: Could not establish a connection to the chat service. Please try again later.

kyc.title: Identity Verification
kyc.step1_desc: To secure your account and comply with regulations, we need to verify your identity. This process is quick and secure.
kyc.step1_item1: A valid government-issued photo ID (Passport, ID Card).
kyc.step1_item2: A recent photo of yourself (selfie) to upload.
kyc.step1_item3: A recent proof of address (utility bill, bank statement).
kyc.step2_desc: Please choose the type of document you want to use and upload a clear picture of it.
kyc.step3_desc: Please upload a clear, readable image of the full document.
kyc.step4_desc: Upload a recent utility bill (less than 3 months old) or bank statement showing your name and address.
kyc.step5_desc: Take a picture of yourself to confirm your identity. Make sure your face is well-lit and fully visible.
kyc.step6_desc: Thank you for submitting your documents. We are now reviewing your information. Processing time is usually 24 to 48 hours. We will notify you once the process is complete.
kyc.unverified_description: To access this feature, you need to complete your identity verification first. It's a quick and secure process to protect your account.
kyc.pending_description: Your documents are being reviewed. This usually takes 24-48 hours. You can continue to browse your dashboard.
kyc.clickSubmit: Click 'Submit' to finalize your verification request.
kyc.file_too_large_desc: Please select a file smaller than 5MB.
kyc.missing_documents_desc: Please upload all required documents before submitting.
kyc.submission_error_desc: Could not submit your documents. Please try again.

notFound.title: Oops! Page not found.
notFound.description: The page you are looking for might have been removed, had its name changed, or is temporarily unavailable.
